element.name: Phosphorus
element.appearance: waxy white/ red/ black/ colorless/ yellow

element.name: Iron
element.appearance: lustrous metallic with a grayish tinge

element.name: Nickel
element.appearance: lustrous, metallic and silvery with a gold tinge

element.name: Uranium
element.appearance: silvery gray metallic; corrodes to a spalling black oxide coat in air

element.name: Fermium
element.appearance: unknown, probably silvery white or metallic gray
